page.title: 20Domesday in Leafield.
page.content: 31 children from the junior class of Leafield Primary School participated in the project.Initially they delivered 500 informative letters,followed by 40 questionnaires to volunteers.Practically they have had to concentrate on the village,but a group of older children cycled round the whole area at the end of the project. The children would like to thank everyone in Leafield for their interest and help,but especially the following: Sue Bodinham,Iris Clapton,David Colmer,Barry Philcox,Betty Appleton,Terry Pearson,Pam Beale,Pat Calcutt and their teacher,Juliet Smart. During the project the children interiewed people,drew and read maps and made a relief map of tkeir km. square and learnt a great deal about their home area.
